show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Detroit Is No More. Abandon Ship…

title: Detroit Is No More. Abandon Ship…
content:
Exactly what can happen (excluding a nuclear conflict) to render life intolerable in the United States. The example of Argentina.
Even John McCain is says, “The battlefield is the United States of America”.
Governments in trouble ALWAYS resort to strong-arm tactics to disguise their inability to govern competently.
The example of Germany in the 1930s.
Despite assurances to the contrary, the US economy is rapidly barreling downhill.
Plenty of statistics here in support of this.
Karl Denninger talking about the economy.
Says the coming crash will be worse than 1929.
(He’s right).
Unemployment gathering momentum worldwide.
The situation is very grave.
